projects.title: Metadata Automated Review Checker
projects.description: Project at TC Energy which involved scaling and improved a cloud-native serverless solution for verifying data using AI on engineering drawings.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: This website that you are currently visiting! This is the first webapp I have built using the following tech stack and with no other dependencies.

projects.title: Traffic Collision Rules Mining
projects.description: Machine learning project using Apriori Algorithm to gain insights from the traffic collision database of Canada.

projects.title: Course Scheduling Algorithm
projects.description: An AI project that uses Set-based Search to find an optimal time slot assignment for courses in an academic term.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Overflow
projects.description: A 'buggy' game of Tic Tac Toe against an unbeatable AI (minimax algorithm), intended as a tutorial for buffer overflow.

projects.title: Course Enrollment Bot
projects.description: Script that acts as an API for the University of Calgary student portal which can poll availability of courses and enroll the user to a course.
